content: Revenues for the third quarter of fiscal â23 were $38 million, representing a 21% increase compared to $31.5 million recorded in the prior year period. SG&A expenses for the first 9 months of fiscal â23 were $20.3 million, an increase of 33% as compared to $15.3 million recorded in the prior year period. For the third quarter of fiscal â23, the company recorded a net income of $500,000 or $0.01 per basic and diluted share, as compared to a net income of $2.2 million or $0.04 per basic and diluted share for the third quarter of fiscal â22. For the first 9 months of fiscal â23, the company recorded a net income of $900,000 or $0.01 per basic and diluted share, as compared to net income of $12.1 million or $0.20 per basic and $0.19 per diluted share, respectively, during the prior year period.
